textBeforeTable: Elevator. NSFW. VCR Hack. Flying car reaches new milestone. Thanks Slashdot. Media: Funny Faces of Senior Citizens Playing Wii. Images: Up, up and away- Rare Superman comic for sale. Thanks Digg. Auction: NBC orders Jerry Seinfeld reality series. Secret Lives of Comic Store Employees. Stories: Inside The Inboxes of 15 Fictional Villains. Links: Altair. Speedway Tower Defense. Slammings. Play: Thanks Ant and Mike Martinez. February Links: As February draws to a close, I want to give the broadcast professionals of the world something to work on for next year. Look at the way the month is spelled, and take note of the "r" in the middle there. Not the one at the end; most of you have that one down cold. No, I'm talking about the first one, which makes the pronunciation of the word "February," not "Febuary." You have 11 months to practice
